name: FNAF 6 Nightshift
description:
This Game is kinda like FNAF 6 but with a full monitor system that you can watch the animatronics on!

includes:

- Six Nights and an Endless Mode

- Most of the Characters From FNAF 6

- Minigames

- Easter Eggs

if you enjoyed be sure to follow and like and I will try to follow you ASAP
